column4: when I got to install java-package it asks me for the ubuntu edgy cd but when I put it in it doesn't see it because my dvd drive is called dvdrecorder and not cdrom... anyone know how to resolve this?
jrid, yes works fine, I can see the ubuntu disk mounted on my desktop
you need to enable universe and multiverse follow that link ubotu just gave you and after that is done you can sudo aptitude install sun-java5-jre from terminal
I use java5 and it works just fine
